```{r}
#do time series of all cases and wrap by state to try to find outbreaks to look at for fututre virus analyis

fCDV_Clean19 <-   readRDS(here::here("data", "processed_data", "CDV19_clean.rds"))

floor<- fCDV_Clean19%>% dplyr :: mutate(Date_new = lubridate::floor_date(Date, unit ="month"))

ggplot(floor, aes(Date_new)) +geom_histogram(bins=540) +facet_wrap(~State)
```
